inclusion.criterion: Laparoscopic surgical procedure of 2 hours duration requiring IV fluid administration
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Uncorrected plasma sodium level before surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diseases which cause abnormal ADH secretion
exclusion.label: not_met
met
exclusion.evidence: quote: 'His Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score (BVAS) is above 4 since the beginning of his disease.'

notes: Patient has Wegener's granulomatosis, but no indication of abnormal ADH secretion or chronic lung disease.
